page.description: Defines the font, point size, and style.

argument.name: {font= }
argument.description: Character. The leading {font= and trailing } characters are required.

argument.name: Font_Name
argument.description: Character. The name of an installed type face. Case insensitive.

argument.name: Point_Size
argument.description: Numeric. An integer value. Note that, unlike True Type and Postscript fonts, some built-in Windows fonts do not support all point sizes.

argument.name: Style
argument.description: Character. Optional. Default = "" (normal) "b" = bold "i" = italic "u" = underline You may combine attributes, as in "bi" = bold italic.

section.note: You must not have any space characters in the finished command.

section.title: Discussion>
section.description: The {FONT} command defines the font, point size, and style. One or more {font=font_specification} statements may appear inside the Format section of a UI_DLG_BOX() function.
